productionSqlExpression: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT oh.order_no) AS NewRentalCount_Month11 FROM oe_hdr oh WHERE oh.rental_billing_flag = 'U' AND oh.order_date >= DATEFROMPARTS( YEAR(DATEADD(month, -11, GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month, -11, GETDATE())), 1 ) AND oh.order_date < DATEFROMPARTS( YEAR(DATEADD(month, -10, GETDATE())), MONTH(DATEADD(month, -10, GETDATE())), 1 );
calculationType: Count rental contracts for the appropriate calendar month.
